user_question: What are the nutritional benefits of spirulina and generate an image of a spirulina smoothie?
final_answer: Spirulina is rich in protein, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. It supports immune function, reduces inflammation, and improves gut health. Image of a spirulina smoothie generated. Spirulina is suitable for vegans as it is a type of blue-green algae.
